01_data_basics/02_proportion/07_read_histogram_discrete_v1

A standard eight-sided die was rolled 20 times, and the results were organized into the histogram shown below.



  1. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}<6.5]\).
  2. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}>5.5]\).
  3. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-4.5|<3]\).
  4. Evaluate \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-6|>0.5]\).
  5. Evaluate half-integer boundary \(b\) such that \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}<b] = 0.8\).
  6. Evaluate half-integer boundary \(b\) such that \(\text{prop}[\mathbf{x}>b] = 0.65\).
  7. Evaluate integer radius \(r\) such that \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-4.5|<r] = 0.45\).
  8. Evaluate half-integer radius \(r\) such that \(\text{prop}[|\mathbf{x}-3|>r] = 0.65\).
